channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The 50-Year Mortgage Would Make Things Worse for Gen Z
item.description: This is not the answer to the housing crisis.

item.title: This Time, It’s the Populists Who Are Underestimating Trump
item.description: The idea that another candidate can win in 2028 with a purer version of Buchananism ignores the president’s actual appeal.

item.title: Texas sues county for helping migrants access legal support as they fight deportation: 'Evil and wicked'
item.description: Texas Attorney General Ken Paxton sued Harris County over a program he called "evil and wicked" that helps migrants facing deportation obtain lawyers.

item.title: Russia’s first AI-powered robot walked on stage to triumphant music, took a few steps, and then immediately faceplanted
item.description: AIdol has some work to do before it can catch up to its western competition.

item.title: Record U.S. government shutdown is over—but Wall Street only has 10 weeks to relax before the next one could begin
item.description: U.S. government shutdown ends after 43 days, but markets brace for another funding fight as investors weigh lost data and Fed uncertainty.

item.title: Fighting to Preserve the American Experiment
item.description: The conservative movement is needed today more than ever, especially as the alternatives fail.

item.title: The Government vs. Animal Lovers
item.description: If you enjoy the company of animals, the government may deem you a criminal.

item.title: Importing Foreign Workers To Take Americans’ Jobs Is The Opposite Of America First
item.description: You cannot put America first by putting Americans last.
